page.title: 20CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY.
page.content: Shrewsbury is a{Christian}area served by churches of varying denominations. These include{Anglican,Roman Catholic and{Methodists.}Although they have their own way of worshipping they work very closely together to serve the community. The{clergy}are kept busy most days of the week visiting the sick and house bound. Marriage and funeral arrangements also have to be made.The Christian community provide a centre for the unemployed,the lonely and tramps,next to{St.Alkmunds Church in the town centre.In Abbey Foregate they also finance and run a social centre for the local deaf people.Most of the{congregation}appear to be elderly people.At school out of 140 junior children only 20 attended church regularly.Shrewsbury boasts many beautiful churches but the{Abbey is a must for any tourist to visit.
